segments.text: I watch as the woman stands there, unbothered by the disaster unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is solely on that plate, but there's so much more at stake here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even see it happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little bubble, while chaos reigns just beyond her vision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, good grief, what are they thinking climbing that stool?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches toward the cookie jar, while the girl waits, her eyes gleaming with hunger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don’t realize how quickly things can go wrong, do they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, almost mocking the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wish I could shake her out of her daze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all end in an accident, and yet here we are, pretending everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR
